report.title: Coffin Nail Tea
report.author: pea
report.bodytext: Well, I did this when I was very young. I was simply interested. /n /n This is beyond dangerous, aparently this is bordering on the fatal dose of nicotine! It was certainly very unpleasant. /n /n Anyway, three 'regal' cigarettes were put in a tea-pot with some boilling water and left to brew for about 3 minutes. /n /n The resulting tea was then drunk, it tasted very nice. /n /n Then, for about 3 hours I experinced a form of agony. I had a powerfull aversion to light, I had to cover my eyes in a darkened room, there was also a horrible full body buzzing sensation and a mild headache. /n /n Finally it all went away, and I have smoked ever since. /n /n Regal makes me feel sick however.
